Song.title: Cling to Christ
Song.copyright: Music and words by Jason Hansen, Bob Kauflin, and David LaChance, Jr. © 2015 Sovereign Grace Praise (BMI)

Arrangement.text:
INTRO: [D/F# | G | D/A | Asus ]
VERSE 1: Father, [D]I can come to [Asus]You and boast of [D/F#]deeds I've [G]done In my [D]pride I strive to [Asus]earn the favor [D/F#]Christ has [G]won He a[A]lone pleads my ac[G]ceptance, [D/F#]all my w[G]orks [D/F#]a - s[G]ide So I [D]come with empty [Asus]hands and I [G]cling to [D]Christ. [| G | D/F# | A]
VERSE 2: Father, [D]I can go a[Asus]stray and battle ne[D/F#]edless fea[G]rs Voices [D]tell me I’m con[Asus]demned and that I c[D/F#]an’t draw n[G]ear But Your [A]Spirit calls me [G]homeward [D/F#]with Your [G]words [D/F#]of [G]life Jesus [D]bore my every [Asus]sin, so, I [G]cling to C[D]hrist [| G]
BRIDGE: It’s more than [Em]I can [Bm]do to keep my [G]hold on [A]You But all my [Em]hope and [Bm]peace is that You [G]cling to [A]me It’s more than [Em]I can [Bm]do to keep my [G]hold on [A]You But all my [Em]hope and [Bm]peace is that You [G]cling to [A]me [| A]
VERSE 3: Father, [D]all my earthly [Asus]aims in time will [D/F#]turn to [G]dust Let me [D]learn that loss is [Asus]gain for those who [D/F#]know Your l[G]ove All the [A]treasures of this [G]world will [D/F#]never [G]sa[D/F#]tis - [G]fy You al[D]one are endless [Asus]joy, so I cl[G]ing to Ch[Bm7]rist [(to go to bridge: D)]
TO END: You al[D]one are endless [Asus]joy, so I cl[G]ing to C[D]hrist.
Arrangement.searchtext: intro verse 1 father i can come to you and boast of deeds ive done in my pride i strive to earn the favor christ has won he alone pleads my acceptance all my works a side so i come with empty hands and i cling to christ verse 2 father i can go astray and battle needless fears voices tell me im condemned and that i cant draw near but your spirit calls me homeward with your words of life jesus bore my every sin so i cling to christ bridge its more than i can do to keep my hold on you but all my hope and peace is that you cling to me its more than i can do to keep my hold on you but all my hope and peace is that you cling to me verse 3 father all my earthly aims in time will turn to dust let me learn that loss is gain for those who know your love all the treasures of this world will never satis fy you alone are endless joy so i cling to christ to end you alone are endless joy so i cling to christ
